https://tmrev.io/movie/842938-Abraham's Boys 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Abraham’s Boys is a short story by Hill, which has already been adapted into a short film in 2009 by Dorothy Street. A sequel of sorts to Dracula, the story follows Abraham Van Helsing’s children, as they attempt to uncover his past while he becomes more unhinged and violent. The adaptation will follow the perspective of a female Asian character, who witnesses the boys' trauma firsthand. Abraham's Boys
